name: FrogSlayer Software
tag_list: custom, software, development, application, web, design, web-application, desktop-application, software-as-a-service, american-software
overview:
FrogSlayer is a fully integrated software development team. We work with corporate customers and ISVs to create next-generation applications and games on the latest Microsoft platforms. This includes Windows 8, Windows Phone, WPF, Silverlight and XNA.

We are fluent in the latest web, mobile and desktop technologies with a unique blend of expertise in strategy, design and engineering. We pride ourselves in creating exceptional project experiences by making a no-compromise commitment to deliver innovative applications, freakishly fast.

Founded in 2005, FrogSlayer is employee-owned and headquartered in Austin, Texas. We specialize in apps and games for Windows 8, Windows Phone, WPF, Silverlight, XNA, ASP.NET MVC and open web technologies. Our customers include major corporate brands and ISVs like Microsoft, Dell and Halliburton.
